backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing four async arithmetic functions (add, subtract, multiply, divide) for Float values, with a trap on division by zero.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two calculator features (UI functionality and visual theme) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors for background, card, primary, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the Calculator component inside a full-height background container.
frontend/src/components/Calculator.tsx: Full-featured calculator UI component with digit/operator/function buttons, display formatting, chained operation state, keyboard support, and backend calls via the useCalculate mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query mutation hook that dispatches add, subtract, multiply, or divide calls to the backend actor based on the provided operation type.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts, defining calculator-specific OKLCH design tokens, and utility classes for display font and button press animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens (including calculator-specific tokens), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Calculator App project, including existing UI/theme features already implemented and pending feature requests for a backend arithmetic actor and basic calculator functionality.
